SEARCH
Package model.cgoal

Interface CommonGoals

All Known Implementing Classes:
CornersEqualsCommonGoals, diagonalEqualCommonGoals, eightEqualCommonGoals, equalXCommonGoals, fiveColumnsCommonGoals, fourRowsCommonGoals, FourVerticalCommonGoals, SixPairsEqualCommonGoals, subMatrix2CommonGoals, threeDisegualColumnsCommonGoals, twoColumnsCommonGoals, twoRowsAllDifferentCommonGoals
public interface CommonGoals
The CommonGoals interface represents the common goals in the game. It defines the contract for implementing common goals.

      Retrieves the current point value.

    • Checker

      int Checker(Tile[][] matrix)
      Checks the result of a condition based on the provided matrix of tiles.
      Parameters:
      matrix - The matrix of tiles to check.
      Returns:
      The result of the condition. It can be 0 or the current point.

      Prints the layout of the game's visual representation. This method prints a formatted layout of the game's visual representation to the console, representing the structure or design of the game.
